question: Can I suggest topics for future issues?
answer: Absolutely! I welcome topic suggestions and any other ideas and thoughts from readers. Feel free to send them to [fyodor@metaframe.works](mailto:fyodor@metaframe.works), [my Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/fyodor.io), or reply directly to any newsletter issue, if you're subscribed. I genuinely value any input as it helps me cover the topics most relevant to the newsletter community.
